content:
I actually don't remember the name of the cookbook right now, but it's focused on global cuisine, with a lot of international recipes. I've been really enjoying trying out dishes from different cultures.

And yes, cooking has definitely changed my approach to food and meal planning. I've been meal prepping on Sundays, making a big batch of rice, quinoa, or grains to use throughout the week in different dishes. It's been really helpful in reducing food waste and making healthy eating easier.
